entry.para: number of account addresses to be queried for active accounts
operator address associated with the given alias name
total amount of tokens held by IoTeX accounts
total number of IOTX holders so far
IotexBalanceByHeight returns the balance of the given address at the given height.
ActiveAccounts lists most recently active accounts
OperatorAddress finds the delegate's operator address given the delegate's alias name
Alias finds the delegate's alias name given the delegate's operator address
TotalNumberOfHolders returns total number of IOTX holders so far
TotalAccountSupply returns total amount of tokens held by IoTeX accounts
whether actions exist for the given address
total number of actions for the given address
start date in unix epoch time
end date in unix epoch time
whether actions exist within the time frame
total number of actions within the time frame
whether actions exist within the time frame
whether actions exist for the given type
total number of actions for the given type
whether EVM transfers exist for the given address
total number of EVM transfers for the given address
ActionByType finds actions by action type
EvmTransfersByAddress finds EVM transfers by address
total circulating supply no reward pool
number of last blocks that are backtracked to compute TPS
whether the starting epoch number is less than the most recent epoch number
MostRecentTPS gives the latest transactions per second
NumberOfActions gives the number of actions
TotalTransferredTokens gives the amount of tokens transferred within a time frame
percentage of the reward to be paid to the delegate
whether the delegate has bookkeeping information within the specified epoch range
total number of buckets in the given epoch for the given delegate
whether the delegate has voting bucket information within the specified epoch range
total number of buckets in the given epoch for the given delegate
whether the delegate has productivity information within the specified epoch range
whether the delegate has reward information within the specified epoch range
whether the delegate has staking information within the specified epoch range
BucketInfo provides voting bucket detail information for candidates within a range of epochs
BookKeeping gives delegates an overview of the reward distributions to their voters within a range of epochs
Productivity gives block productivity of producers within a range of epochs
Rewards provides reward detail information for candidates within a range of epochs
Staking provides staking information for candidates within a range of epochs
ProbationHistoricalRate provides the rate of probation for a given delegate
whether Hermes has bookkeeping information within the specified epoch range
ratio of block reward being distributed
ratio of epoch reward being distributed
ratio of foundation bonus being distributed
whether the delegate has hermes information within the specified epoch range
whether the voter uses Hermes within the specified epoch range
whether the delegate is qualified for waiving the service fee
whether Hermes has bookkeeping information within the specified epoch range
number of Hermes delegates within the epoch range
number of voters who vote for Hermes delegates within the epoch range
total reward amount distributed within the epoch range
Hermes gives delegates who register the service of automatic reward distribution an overview of the reward distributions to their voters within a range of epochs
HermesByVoter returns Hermes voters' receiving history
HermesByDelegate returns Hermes delegates' distribution history
HermesAverageStats returns the Hermes average statistics
whether the voter has reward information within the specified epoch range
whether the starting epoch number is less than the most recent epoch number
number of consensus delegates in the epoch
number of total delegates in the epoch
candidate total weighted votes in the epoch
total voted tokens in the epoch
RewardSources provides reward sources for voters
VotingMeta provides metadata of voting results
total number of Xrc20 contract addresses
whether Xrc20 actions exist for the given sender address or recipient address
whether Xrc20 actions exist for the given contract address
whether Xrc20 actions exist for the given contract address
total number of token holder addresses
XRC20ByAddress returns Xrc20 actions given the sender address or recipient address
XRC20ByContractAddress returns Xrc20 actions given the Xrc20 contract address
XRC20ByPage returns Xrc20 actions by pagination
XRC20TokenHolderAddresses returns Xrc20 token holder addresses given a Xrc20 contract address
total number of Xrc721 contract addresses
whether Xrc721 actions exist for the given sender address or recipient address
whether Xrc721 actions exist for the given contract address
whether Xrc721 actions exist for the given contract address
total number of token holder addresses
XRC721ByAddress returns Xrc721 actions given the sender address or recipient address
XRC721ByContractAddress returns Xrc721 actions given the Xrc721 contract address
XRC721ByPage returns Xrc721 actions by pagination
XRC721TokenHolderAddresses returns Xrc721 token holder addresses given a Xrc721 contract address

row.entry: Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint32 instead.
Uses variable-length encoding. Inefficient for encoding negative numbers if your field is likely to have negative values, use sint64 instead.
Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int32s.
Uses variable-length encoding. Signed int value. These more efficiently encode negative numbers than regular int64s.
Always four bytes. More efficient than uint32 if values are often greater than 2^28.
Always eight bytes. More efficient than uint64 if values are often greater than 2^56.
A string must always contain UTF-8 encoded or 7-bit ASCII text.
May contain any arbitrary sequence of bytes.
